results.name: Marmargee Fighter Girl vs. Zombies & Monsters!

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i5 recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce or AMD Radeon for desktop or mobile
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 775 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard sound card
  • Additional Notes: This game runs in 16:9 aspect ratios (Windows native). The following resolutions are supported: 1920 x 1080 1600 x 900 1366 x 768 1280 x 720. The following deviations have been tested: 1680 x 1050 1360 x 768. Other resolutions are not supported.
